name: Arcsaber VR
description:
Arcsaber VR is a fast-paced, zero-gravity game with unique melee combat. Fly through space "superman-style" and use the Arcsaber to destroy the bombs before they reach Earth!

Game Features:
  • Destroy the bombs before they reach Earth.
  • Arcsaber becomes longer the wider you swing.
  • Fire a shockwave by locking-on before swinging.
  • Quick-swap between Arcsaber, pistol and thrusters.
  • Dual wield the same item to gain a power boost.
  • Complete freedom of flight in zero-gravity.
